name: Humble Wizard
description:
Is it magic? Something strange is going on... Someone from outside world is touching my world...

Developed by Chili.

This game is developed under 22 hours for ATOM Game Jam #2 and it is also my first game, so critics... Please be kind...

Humble Wizard is a puzzle platformer game with some rogue-lite elements.  

Player must move some objects and monsters by using the mouse to progress in the game.

Player needs to collect 5 gems and find the exit. 

***If you get stuck in some point, try to move some floor or ceiling objects :)

KeyBinds

Move Left - A

Move Right - D

Jump - Space

Shoot - E

Talk - F

Use/Interact - Left Mouse Button

*** I am a new in game developing, so I can't know that whether I am on the right path, or not.  Please feel free to write a comment about your positive and negative thoughts, so I can make some adjustments or improvements on this game and all of my future games...
